mapper.select: select dsn.node_code, dsn.parent_node_code, dsn.node_name from sys_data_struct_node dsn where dsn.struct_code = 'app_goods' and dsn.parent_node_code='G' order by dsn.node_code,dsn.display_order
select atn.node_code, atn.parent_node_code, atn.node_name from app_technology_node atn order by atn.node_code
mapper.update: update app_technology_attribute set is_default ='N' where node_code = #{nodeCode}
mapper.select: select count(1) from app_technology_attribute where node_code=#{nodeCode} and is_default='Y'
